Article Title: Rohit Sharma breaks silence on ODI retirement, says 'I will stop when ... '
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you think Rohit Sharma should continue playing ODIs after his recent statements? No, it's time for him to retire Yes, he still has a lot to offer

Explained: Why Rohit Sharma retired from Test cricket

Poll Do you think Rohit Sharma should continue playing ODIs after his T20 retirement? No, it's time to retire. Yes, he should.

India's probable Test squad for England Tour

NEW DELHI: India‚Äôs white-ball captain Rohit Sharma has finally addressed questions surrounding his future in One Day Internationals (ODIs). In a candid conversation with senior journalist Vimal Kumar, Rohit made it clear that while he‚Äôs not done just yet, he‚Äôs very aware of when to walk away.The veteran opener emphasised his evolved approach to batting, saying, "I used to play the way I used to, I took my time. Earlier, I would play 30 balls in the first 10 overs and be at just 10 runs. But if I play 20 balls now, why can't I score 30, 35, or even 40 runs? And on the days when I get going, hitting the accelerator, scoring 80 runs in the first 10 overs isn't bad at all. That's how I think now."READ ALSO: 'Bekaar': Rohit Sharma makes shocking statement about naturally-gifted player "I‚Äôve done it; I‚Äôve scored the runs I was meant to. Now, I want to play cricket in a different way. I‚Äôm not taking any of this for granted. Don‚Äôt assume that things will just keep going the same way, that I‚Äôll keep scoring 20 or 30 runs and just continue playing. The day I feel like I‚Äôm not able to do what I want to do on the field, I‚Äôll stop playing. That‚Äôs for sure. But right now, I know that what I‚Äôm doing is still helping the team," he added.READ ALSO: Rohit Sharma hits back at criticism: 'Defending myself is waste of time' Rohit has been a key pillar in India's ODI setup, with 11,168 runs in 273 matches at an impressive average of 48.76. Under his leadership, India clinched the T20 World Cup in 2024 and the Champions Trophy earlier this year, further cementing his legacy in white-ball cricket.While he called time on his T20 career after the Barbados final, the 37-year-old recently stepped away from Test cricket after an 11-year career, having played 67 Tests and scored 4,301 runs. His highest Test score, 212, came during a memorable series against South Africa in 2019.While he‚Äôs shut the door on red-ball cricket, just like his compatriot Virat Kohli, who hung his Test boots on Monday in an unexpected retirement call, both Kohli and Rohit remain committed to ODIs, for now. Perhaps the pair is keeping an eye on the upcoming 2027 ODI World Cup.Rohit‚Äôs message is clear: he‚Äôs still hungry, still driven, but when the moment comes to step aside, he‚Äôll do it on his own terms.
Article Summary: Rohit sharma has finally addressed questions surrounding his future in one day internationals. The 37-year-old recently retired from test cricket after an 11-year career. Rohit has been a key pillar in india's odi setup, with 11,168 runs in 273 matches at an impressive average of 48.76.

Article Title: Jayson Tatum‚Äôs dramatic exit sparks debate as Celtics confirm Achilles tear but some fans doubt the injury is real
Article Text:
Jayson Tatum has undergone surgery due to his injury.(Image via Bob DeChiara-Imagn Images)

Jayson Tatum‚Äôs viral video gets him brutally trolled by fans as many doubt if he is even injured



Jayson Tatum, one of the most popular and talented players of the Boston Celtics, shocked everyone when everyone saw him fall to the ground as the Celtics lost to the New York Knicks in Game 4 of the Eastern Conference semifinal series. Jayson Tatum looked visibly in pain and recently, the Boston Celtics announced that he has a torn Achilles tendon and has been ruled out for the rest of the postseason. While fans of the Boston Celtics are devastated over this news, a picture of Jayson Tatum has fans trolling him.As Jayson Tatum was being carried out in a wheelchair, the star player looked devastated as he covered his face with his hands, but some fans doubt his injury.A fan commented, ‚ÄúImagine he shat himself‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚Äúfaking injury to mask that stinkerüò≠üò≠.‚ÄùA third fan commented, ‚ÄúFor sake of comparison, Kobe stayed in the game and hit two free throws when he tore his achilles. Just sayin‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚ÄúAs a lifelong Celtics fan, it looked too Lebron-like. Team losing late, poor shooting from him late, go out with injury to save face. Could be real injury but didn't look like much at all.‚ÄùA fifth fan noted, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sure he just crapped his pants like Paul Pierce did. He‚Äôll be back. Tatum doesn‚Äôt do anything original.‚ÄùHowever, some fans have supported Jayson Tatum during his tough time. A fan wrote, ‚Äúlike him or not this is actually sad and painful, wishing him a speedy recovery, despite the jokes we got to act human to others bcus we wont want to be in such positions.‚ÄùAnother user wrote, ‚ÄúThese comments are terrible. The man is an NBA champion. He has a serious injury.‚ÄùBoston Celtics‚Äô Al Horford spoke about Jayson Tatum‚Äôs injury and said, "I mean, the loss is the loss. More importantly, you know, it's Jayson and that's what I'm worried about. And I'm just making sure I'm there for him. That's my priority ... It's very concerning‚Ä¶‚ÄùThe Boston Celtics are scheduled to play against the New York Knicks in Game 5 tonight.Also Read: All about Michael Jordan‚Äôs massive wealth and how his new deal with NBC is set to boost his earnings
Article Summary: Jayson tatum has been ruled out for the rest of the postseason with a torn achilles tendon. Boston celtics lost to the new york knicks in game 4 of the eastern conference semifinal series. Fans of the boston celtics are devastated over this news, as many doubt if he is injured.

Article Title: NBA Trade Rumors: Golden State Warriors could acquire $101,355,998 Los Angeles Lakers superstar to form Big 3 with Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler
Article Text:
The Golden State Warriors are contemplating a significant roster change, potentially targeting LeBron James to bolster their frontcourt. Despite concerns about age and injury risks with a lineup featuring James, Curry, Butler, and Green, the move could provide championship pedigree and an unstoppable offensive duo. Contract hurdles and James' commitment to the Lakers remain key obstacles.

Golden State Warriors

(Disclaimer: As of right now, the information and analysis in this piece are preliminary. It's important to keep in mind that even while the information is based on trustworthy sources, these are not official statements or confirmed activities. As the offseason goes on, readers are encouraged to wait for official updates and exercise caution when interpreting this analysis.)

LeBron James to the Golden State Warriors? NBA Insider Weighs In

Why the Move Makes Sense

Potential Roadblocks

Playoff History Between LeBron James and Stephen Curry

Matchup



Result (LeBron‚Äôs Record)



NBA Finals Outcome



2015 Finals



Warriors win (0-1)



GSW 4-2 CLE



2016 Finals



Cavaliers win (1-1)



CLE 4-3 GSW



2017 Finals



Warriors win (1-2)



GSW 4-1 CLE



2018 Finals



Warriors win (1-3)



GSW 4-0 CLE





What‚Äôs Next for Golden State?

Theface an uncertain future after a challenging playoff run. Stephen Curry is nearing the end of his of his illustrious career and so is Draymond Green. Even though they acquired Jimmy Butler earlier this year, their path to the Western Conference could look bleak given the injuries that these players succumb to. Could a blockbuster move for a Lakers superstar change their fortunes next season? Sports Illustrated‚Äôs Alex Kirschenbaum recently suggested that the Golden State Warriors might pursue Los Angeles Lakers forward LeBron James this offseason. James, a four-time NBA champion, could provide Golden State with much-needed frontcourt size and experience.Kirschenbaum noted: "(LeBron) James has long been linked to Golden State, in part because his rivalry against Warriors stars Stephen Curry and Draymond Green (they've played each other in five playoff series, during which James has gone 2-3) eventually blossomed into a bromance."However, age and injury concerns loom large. A potential lineup featuring James (39), Curry (37), Jimmy Butler (35), and Draymond Green (34) would raise questions about durability.According to Caleb Hightower of the Sporting News 1. Championship Pedigree: James brings unmatched playoff experience and leadership.2. Fit with Curry: Their contrasting skill sets could create an unstoppable offensive duo.3. Lakers‚Äô Struggles: With L.A. failing to advance past the first round, James may seek a new challenge.- Injury Risks: James, Curry, and Butler all dealt with significant injuries this postseason.- Contract Hurdles: James holds a $52.6 million player option, complicating any trade or signing.- Lakers‚Äô Plans: His commitment to playing alongside Luka Donƒçiƒá could keep him in Los Angeles.If the Warriors exit the playoffs early and seek a roster shakeup, James could emerge as a high-risk, high-reward target. While his arrival would electrify the Bay Area, logistical and financial challenges make this move far from guaranteed.Also read: NBA Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers predicted to sign $197,230,450 Memphis Grizzlies star to bolster squad around LeBron James and Luka Doncic For now, fans can only speculate‚Äîbut the idea of LeBron in a Warriors jersey remains a fascinating possibility.
Article Summary: The golden state warriors are contemplating a significant roster change. They could target lebron james to bolster their frontcourt. The move could provide championship pedigree and an unstoppable offensive duo. Contract hurdles and james' commitment to the lakers remain key obstacles.

Article Title: ‚ÄúOur favourite you‚Äù: Dwyane Wade pens heartfelt words for Gabrielle Union days after the couple opened up about the NBA legend‚Äôs health struggles
Article Text:
Dwyane Wade married Gabrielle Union in 2014.(Image via Alexander Tamargo/Getty)

Dwyane Wade‚Äôs words for Gabrielle Union on Mother's Day make the actress emotional



Image via Dwyane Wade/Instagram

Did Gabrielle Union face issues when she started working in Hollywood?



Dwyane Wade, the NBA legend, and his wife, actress Gabrielle Union , have constantly shown the world how deep their love is for one another. With the NBA legend recovering from a tough year where he had to undergo kidney surgery, his wife, Gabrielle Union, has stood by him and never left his side. While the couple is now busy raising their daughter, Dwyane Wade recently praised his wife for being a wonderful mother to their daughter.Dwyane Wade took to his Instagram stories to post a heartwarming picture of them being in bed along with their daughter, as it seems like Gabrielle Union is reading a bedtime story to their daughter. As the family cuddled in bed under pink blankets, Dwyane Wade added the words, ‚ÄúOur favourite you‚Äù to the adorable picture.Another picture posted by Dwyane Wade is a picture from their MET Gala appearance this year, where the two looked stunning as they walked hand in hand. Dwyane Wade added the words, ‚ÄúHappy Mother's Day. We love and appreciate you‚Äù, to this. Gabrielle Union reposted this picture and added crying emojis to it, which shows how much this gesture has moved her.While both Dwyane Wade and his wife, Gabrielle Union, have spoken about how the NBA legend‚Äôs health issues had a huge impact on their marriage and family, the famous actress also recently spoke about the hurdles she faced while working in Hollywood.In a documentary, Number One on the Call Sheet on Apple TV+, directed by Reginald Hudlin and Shola Lynch, Gabrielle Union appeared to talk about her experience in Hollywood and the struggles she faced due to racism.Gabrielle Union said, "When you have a more coarse grade of hair, when you have melanin, thicker nose, wider nose, wider lips, you‚Äôre not considered, you know, a classic beauty‚Äù.The famous actress added, "I started feeling invisible, like my beauty wasn‚Äôt wanted..."However, Gabrielle Union has faced her struggles with a strong heart and is one of the most popular and talented actresses in Hollywood today.Also Read: ‚ÄúImagine the school pressure‚Äù: Stephen Curry‚Äôs son Canon Curry‚Äôs reaction resurfaces online and sparks wild fan theories
Article Summary: Dwyane wade and gabrielle union have shown their love for one another. Nba legend recently posted a picture of them cuddled in bed with their daughter. He added the words, ‚Äúhappy mother's day. We love and appreciate you‚Äù the famous actress recently spoke about her struggles while working in hollywood.

Article Title: Auston Matthews: Auston Matthews and his fans got emotional as his mother opened up about the financial struggles of getting him into hockey
Article Text:
Image credit - Paige Taylor White/CP

Auston Matthews‚Äô hockey dream wasn‚Äôt cheap and his mom took the weight

‚ÄúI used to work in the morning for Starbucks, in the afternoon the restaurant, i was very fortunate to have two jobs. And believe me, if they would have more hours, I would have more jobs."





Before Auston Matthews was an NHL superstar, his biggest supporter was clocking into two jobs, trying to make ends meet. His mom, Ema Matthews , didn‚Äôt just believe in his dream, she bankrolled it, penny by penny, from behind a Starbucks counter. For families without deep pockets, hockey can be financially brutal. But Ema‚Äôs resilience turned obstacles into opportunity and her son into one of the league‚Äôs brightest stars. Her story is the heartwarming reminder that every great athlete often has a real-life superhero cheering from the sidelines.Ice time, gear, coaching, travel, youth hockey isn‚Äôt just a sport, it‚Äôs a financial beast. For the Matthews family, especially with Ema being originally from Hermosillo, Mexico, the culture and cost of the sport were both daunting. But she took on the challenge without hesitation, picking up multiple jobs including a gig at Starbucks to ensure Auston never missed a chance to grow on the ice.Ema shared in a past interview that the cost of hockey often reached up to $20,000 a year, a heavy ask for any middle-class family. To make it work, she didn‚Äôt just cut corners, she picked up shifts and poured lattes while helping Auston stay focused on the sport. She even deposited small amounts of money in his account so he could grab food with teammates like a regular teen.Ema‚Äôs story also breaks stereotypes. In a sport dominated by players from Canada and northern U.S. states, Auston‚Äôs rise as a player of Mexican heritage makes his success even more impactful. It's not just about talent, it‚Äôs about trailblazing, especially for kids of color or immigrant families who rarely see themselves represented in hockey.Auston Matthews is one of the Toronto Maple Leafs ‚Äô biggest stars and a face of the NHL. He‚Äôs not just known for his goal-scoring skills but also for his poise and work ethic, traits his mom likely helped instill. While fans celebrate his success on the ice, stories like Ema‚Äôs remind us of the sacrifices behind the scenes that made it possible.Ema Matthews‚Äô story shows what‚Äôs possible when love, grit, and hustle lead the way.Also read - ‚ÄúFrom baptism to strip club‚Äù: Pete Blackburn‚Äôs unhinged NHL comparison is going viral and fans totally get it
Article Summary: Auston matthews‚Äô hockey dream wasn‚Äôt cheap and his mom took the weight of it on her shoulders. For families without deep pockets, hockey can be financially brutal. Ema's resilience turned obstacles into opportunity and her son into one of the league‚Äôs brightest stars.

Article Title: Josh Allen‚Äôs fianc√©e Hailee Steinfeld drops major career bombshell after breakup advice goes viral
Article Text:
Hailee Steinfeld confirmed her dream to host Saturday Night Live (Getty Images)

From Oscar-nominated roles to emotional newsletters‚ÄîHailee‚Äôs journey is more than just stardom

How Hailee Steinfeld is redefining celebrity through emotional honesty and fan-first engagement

Hailee Steinfeld has always been more than a Hollywood actress. From her breakout role in True Grit at just 14 to leading major franchises like Pitch Perfect and Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse, she‚Äôs proven herself as a powerhouse performer. But in 2025, Steinfeld is not only capturing hearts on-screen‚Äîshe‚Äôs reshaping how celebrities connect with their fans through emotional honesty and personal storytelling.Recently, Hailee Steinfeld confirmed her dream to host Saturday Night Live, calling it a ‚ÄúBucket list‚Äù moment in response to a fan‚Äôs question in the BEAU SOCIETY newsletter . While the idea of hosting SNL has excited fans, it‚Äôs only one piece of a much larger vision.Currently starring in Sinners, a 1930s vampire thriller directed by Ryan Coogler, Steinfeld's deep dive into her character‚Äôs mixed-race identity led to personal family discoveries. ‚ÄúIt had such an impact on me personally,‚Äù she told PEOPLE. ‚ÄúTherefore, I feel like the least it can do is make an impact on those that watch it.‚ÄùThe emotional depth of her performance has resonated with audiences. Speaking on Good Morning America, Steinfeld said, ‚ÄúThis character challenged me in ways I‚Äôve never been challenged‚Ä¶‚Äù As her career climbs new heights, her personal growth is equally inspiring.Beyond film, Steinfeld has built a community through her direct-to-fan newsletter, BEAU SOCIETY. With topics ranging from identity to heartbreak, Hailee acts more like a brutally honest best friend than a distant celebrity. ‚ÄúFriendships are special and precious and can be tricky because‚Ä¶ sometimes you drift apart. That‚Äôs okay!‚Äù she advised one reader, delivering wisdom that fans have found deeply comforting.After her past relationship with Niall Horan and current romance with Josh, Steinfeld hasn't shied away from sharing breakup lessons. In BEAU SOCIETY, she even recommended Issa Rae and Michelle Obama podcasts, writing: ‚ÄúTrust that you‚Äôll have many best friends throughout your life. Maybe you‚Äôre about to meet your next one.‚ÄùHailee is changing the game‚Äînot just as a performer, but as a deeply relatable voice for a generation navigating love, loss, and self-discovery. As she said herself, ‚ÄúThis is just the beginning.‚Äù And if that‚Äôs true, her future looks every bit as remarkable as her past.Also Read: ‚ÄúSometimes you drift apart‚Äù: Hailee Steinfeld opens up on emotional heartbreak while Josh Allen plays it safe in the background
Article Summary: Hailee steinfeld is redefining celebrity through emotional honesty and fan-first engagement. Steinfeld has built a community through her direct-to-fan newsletter, beau society. The actress is currently starring in sinners, a vampire thriller directed by ryan coogler.

Article Title: ‚ÄúIt's really true‚Äù ‚Äî Caitlin Clark gives honest statement on Taylor Swift as they share one common ground
Article Text:
Caitlin Clark and Taylor Swift. Image via: Al Bello/Getty Images | Robyn Beck/Getty Images

Caitlin Clark shared details of her unique relationship with Taylor Swift



Taylor Swift and Caitlin Clark. Image via: Getty Images

Caitlin Clark is set for her second WNBA season with the Indiana Fever . Recently, the WNBA standout has shared details of her beautiful bond with music icon Taylor Swift . Recalling the moment that happened in a suite at Arrowhead Stadium with none other than popular singer Taylor Swift.The 23-year-old basketball star shares something surprisingly down-to-earth with the global music icon, revealing that they share a common interest and that is a genuine love for football and a humble view of life in the spotlight.Caitlin Clark, who has been a longtime Kansas City Chiefs fan and self-proclaimed Swiftie, attended a Chiefs playoff game in January. Taylor Swift invited Clark to join her in the Kelce family suite.In a recent ESPN interview with Alexa Philippou, Clark described her time with Swift. "I think what people don't always realize about people with a certain spotlight, whether it's her, whether it's me, whether it's another professional athlete or a pop star, we're real people. We're just having normal conversations as any other person in Arrowhead Stadium that night," Clark said candidly.Clark went on to explain the time she spent with Swift. ‚ÄúShe loves the Chiefs just as much as I do,‚Äù Clark added. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm talking football with her. She loved it, and just like her passion, and honestly, probably one of the sweetest people I‚Äôve ever been around. And everybody says that when you meet her, but it‚Äôs really true. She just treats everybody with the same amount of kindness, and her family was great.‚ÄùSwift‚Äôs kind gesture didn‚Äôt end at the suite. Prior to their hangout at Arrowhead, she had already surprised Clark with four bags of Eras Tour merchandise and a handwritten note. Swift even called her ‚Äúinspiring to watch from afar.‚Äù Clark had previously attended two of Swift‚Äôs Eras Tour concerts in Indianapolis and embraced the Swiftie, even trading friendship bracelets with fans.Still, Clark downplayed the experience with Fever GM Amber Cox. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm like, ‚ÄòOK, well, how was the suite with Taylor?‚Äô She‚Äôs like, ‚ÄòIt was really cool, she was really cool.‚Äô And then she‚Äôs just off to her workout,‚Äù Cox recalled. ‚ÄúAnd you‚Äôre just like, ‚ÄòTell me more!‚Äô I love that about her.‚ÄùAlso Read: Golden State Warriors face bombshell update on Stephen Curry amid looming elimination threat in Game 5 Swift‚Äôs hardcore fans will resonate with her friendship with the rising basketball star, Clark, who has been making her name in the WNBA as one of the standouts in the league. It is possible that the duo will be spotted together in public in another headline-grabbing moment.
Article Summary: Caitlin clark is set for her second wnba season with the indiana fever. Recently, the wnba standout has shared details of her beautiful bond with music icon taylor swift. The 23-year-old basketball star shares something surprisingly down-to-earth with the global music icon.

Article Title: Anthony Stolarz injury update: Goaltender injury raises red flags as NHL expert warns of symptoms 'more serious than a concussion'
Article Text:
Concerns are mounting over Toronto Maple Leafs goaltender Anthony Stolarz's injury (Image via AP)

Vomiting after head contact sparks concern from medical experts

As the Toronto Maple Leafs prepare for a critical Game 5 in their second-round playoff clash against the Florida Panthers, attention has shifted to the troubling injury situation surrounding goaltender Anthony Stolarz . Sidelined since suffering an upper-body injury in Game 1, the 31-year-old netminder‚Äôs status remains uncertain‚Äîand now, an NHL analyst is sounding the alarm on the nature of his symptoms.Anthony Stolarz sustained the injury during Toronto‚Äôs 5-4 Game 1 victory on May 5, following what appeared to be two separate hits to the head: a blistering shot from Sam Reinhart and a forearm to the side of the head by Sam Bennett. While the team has not confirmed the exact cause, the visible effects raised immediate concern.Speaking on TSN‚Äôs ‚ÄúFirst Up,‚Äù NHL analyst Dave Feschuk highlighted the gravity of Stolarz‚Äôs condition. ‚ÄúThe problem is... vomiting on the bench after a head hit, or potentially two head hits... That‚Äôs not normal concussion symptoms ,‚Äù said Feschuk. ‚ÄúIt could mean it was a more serious thing that we don't know what it is.‚ÄùCiting conversations with concussion specialists, Feschuk emphasized that vomiting post-impact isn‚Äôt commonly associated with standard concussion cases.‚ÄúThese guys... were very concerned that the vomiting thing, you know, it could indicate something more serious than a concussion. And obviously, a concussion is very serious, so who knows where Anthony Stolarz is at.‚ÄùDespite the alarming concerns, there was a sliver of optimism when Stolarz returned to the ice for light activity before team practice on Tuesday. Head coach Craig Berube provided a cautious update: ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs doing much better,‚Äù Berube said. ‚ÄúBut no timeline for his return.‚ÄùStolarz is in his first season with the Leafs after signing a two-year, $5 million contract in the offseason. While his presence has been missed in net, the team continues to move forward as they face the Panthers on Wednesday night in what could be a series-defining Game 5.Also Read: NHL Rumors: Edmonton Oilers rumored to be a potential landing spot for $60M star defenseman Aaron Ekblad in free agency For now, both fans and teammates are left hoping for a full recovery‚Äînot just for the team‚Äôs playoff hopes, but for Stolarz‚Äôs long-term health.
Article Summary: Vomiting after head contact sparks concern from medical experts. Anthony stolarz sustained the injury during toronto‚Äôs 5-4 game 1 victory on may 5. Head coach craig berube provided a cautious update: ‚Äúno timeline for his return‚Äù

Article Title: Golden State Warriors face bombshell update on Stephen Curry amid looming elimination threat in Game 5
Article Text:
Stephen Curry. Image via: Carlos Avila Gonzalez / San Francisco Chronicle via Getty Images

Stephen Curry will miss Game 5 against the Minnesota Timberwolves



The Golden State Warriors are on the verge of elimination, and they‚Äôll have to face the remaining high-stakes game without their biggest weapon. Stephen Curry has officially been ruled out of Game 5 against the Minnesota Timberwolves as he continues to recover from a Grade 1 hamstring strain suffered during the second quarter of Game 1. Warriors head coach Steve Kerr recently confirmed that Curry will miss Game 5 as he is not medically cleared.Stephen Curry‚Äôs absence was confirmed by Anthony Slater of The Athletic, who posted on X sharing the update, "Steph Curry is out tomorrow for Game 5 in Minnesota. The Warriors officially face elimination without their star guard." As the Minnesota Timberwolves lead the series 3-1 and the Warriors are playing on the road with a thin red line from elimination.Curry‚Äôs absence is especially painful considering the timing. Golden State took Game 1 despite Curry‚Äôs early exit, but has since dropped three straight games. The offense has sputtered without the two-time MVP, and while others like Jonathan Kuminga and Brandin Podziemski have shown their playmaking abilities on the court, replicating Curry‚Äôs presence and production has proven close to impossible.Speaking with 95.7, Warriors head coach shared, ‚ÄúJimmy was under the weather last night. He really was not feeling well and that definitely impacted him‚Ä¶ Everyone knows who Jimmy is. He's one of the great playoff performers and I expect him to have a big game tomorrow."Curry addressed his condition ahead of Game 5, telling ESPN‚Äôs Marc Spears: "Even if I wanted to be Superman, I couldn't." The quote was in reference to teammate Draymond Green‚Äôs earlier comment where he emphasized the team wouldn‚Äôt try to "Superman this thing." Green added, "If he‚Äôs in a place where he can play, I‚Äôm sure he will."But the reality is, Curry is still not ready. According to NBA insider Shams Charania, Curry‚Äôs progress over the weekend was limited to jogging and some light jump shooting. ‚ÄúUntil you get to that point, there‚Äôs not like a safe way to bring him back from a hamstring injury,‚Äù Charania explained.While Curry has traveled with the team, head coach Kerr confirmed he won‚Äôt suit up for Wednesday‚Äôs do-or-die contest. However, if the Warriors manage to steal Game 5 on the road, there‚Äôs a silver lining. Due to the Golden State Valkyries‚Äô WNBA home opener, Game 6 would be pushed to Sunday, granting Curry three additional days of recovery.Also Read: Stephen Curry says "Even if I wanted to be Superman, I couldn't" as Golden State Warriors continue to struggle It‚Äôs a small window, but one the Warriors are desperate to pry open. Regardless, the Warriors will have to adjust the roster in Game 5, again, without Curry.
Article Summary: Golden state warriors star stephen curry has been ruled out of game 5 against the minnesota timberwolves. Curry is still recovering from a grade 1 hamstring strain suffered during the second quarter of game 1. The minnesota timberwolves lead the series 3-1 and the warriors are playing on the road with a thin red line from elimination.

Article Title: Nicolas Cage shocks fans with transformation in photos from John Madden biopic
Article Text:
Nicolas Cage and Christian Bale shocked fans with their transformations. Source: X

What does Nicolas Cage play in the new Madden movie?

Nicolas Cage shocked fans with a new post as he appeared almost unrecognizable after a daring transformation. These new photos were taken during filming for his upcoming movie Madden.On Monday, the 61-year-old actor was seen in a fat suit while portraying football coach John Madden in the biopic. Madden became the youngest coach to reach 100 career regular-season victories, which he managed in only ten full seasons of coaching. he also has the most wins in Raiders history!Set photos showed Cage in character as Madden, who passed away in 2021, with a significantly larger physique than fans are accustomed to seeing. Filming for Madden started in Atlanta, Georgia, in late April. The film also features Christian Bale as Al Davis.Fans on Reddit responded to the first look at Cage as the legendary NFL coach, with one user commenting, "I‚Äôll watch a football related movie for Cage." "Can‚Äôt wait for this!" another person posted on X.Someone else on X said, "Going to win the Oscar for best picture!"Another comment read, "I think the acting should be terrific. Cage is good and working with Bale should help take him to another level. Christian Bale is one of the best actors of our generation."The film directed by David O. Russell follows Madden‚Äôs journey from his Super Bowl-winning partnership with Al Davis. Alongside Cage and Bale, Madden's cast includes John Mulaney as EA founder Trip Hawkins, Kathryn Hahn as Virginia Madden, and Sienna Miller as Carol Davis. A release date for the film has not yet been announced.
Article Summary: Nicolas cage and christian bale shocked fans with their transformations. Filming for madden started in atlanta, georgia, in late april. The film also features christian bale as al davis. A release date for the film has not yet been announced.

Article Title: Dejan kulusevski begins rehab after suffering patella injury against Crystal Palace
Article Text:
Dejan kulusevski begins rehab after suffering patella injury against palace (Image Source: Getty Images)

Mounting injury crisis threatens Tottenham Hotspur's European dream

Captain Son returns as Postecoglou faces tactical reshuffle

The bid of Tottenham Hotspur for European glory has received a massive blow after the creative midfielder Dejan Kulusevski went under the knife in a patella surgery days before their Europa League final clash with Manchester United. The Swedish international player picked up the injury while playing for Tottenham Hotspur against Crystal Palace in the Premier League last weekend when he came off the pitch after 19 minutes of play. The development comes as a major headache for manager Ange Postecoglou , who now has a huge decision to make going into the club‚Äôs biggest game in years.The 25-year-old Kulusevski has played a major role for Tottenham Hotspur this season, scoring 10 goals and setting up 11 goals in 50 games in all competitions. His absence is adding to Tottenham Hotspur‚Äôs woes, as they have already seen midfield playmakers James Maddison and Lucas Bergvall sidelined with knee and ankle troubles, respectively, for the rest of the campaign.Dejan Kulusevski had gotten injured in the recent Premier League match against Crystal Palace, according to the confirmation by Tottenham Hotspur. After consultation with a medical professional, the Swedish international has gone under the knife and will now start his rehabilitation process under the watchful eyes of the club‚Äôs medical staff.This is the second serious injury blow to Dejan Kulusevski this season, as he had missed seven matches earlier this year with a foot problem in March. Of special worry to the Tottenham Hotspur fans is the timing, as Kulusevski had just-recently found form, playing a key role during the game‚Äôs most crucial Europa League semi-finals against Eintracht Frankfurt and Bodo/Glimt that saw them qualify for the finals.The only bright spot for Tottenham Hotspur has been the return of captain Heung-Min Son from his own foot injury. The South Korean forward, who has not won any trophy with the North London club in ten trophy-less seasons, finds the final a way of completing his Tottenham Hotspur ‚Äúpuzzle‚Äù.Addressing an interview before the forthcoming final of the Europa League, Son Heung-min confessed that winning a major trophy has been the thing lacking in his career for the last decade. ‚ÄúIt feels like I‚Äôve been looking for that last missing piece for the last 10 years,‚Äù Son said. ‚ÄúThis time feels different. I really want to win it ‚Äî maybe more than anybody else.‚ÄùPostecoglou is likely to pair Rodrigo Bentancur, Yves Bissouma, and Pape Matar Sarr in the midfield against Manchester United, but Wilson Odobert is another alternative, even though he flopped when he replaced Kulusevski against Crystal Palace.The Tottenham Hotspur fans will get a chance to see their team try and win their first major trophy since the year 2008 when they face off against Manchester United on Wednesday, May 21, at San Mames Stadium, Bilbao. Coverage begins at 20:00 BST on TNT Sports and discovery+.Also Read: Thiago Alcantara can‚Äôt hide his admiration for Bar√ßa‚Äôs new generation after 4 to 3 Cl√°sico win The surgical intervention effectively ends Dejan Kulusevski's season, delivering another cruel blow to Tottenham Hotspur's hopes of ending their 17-year trophy drought.
Article Summary: Tottenham hotspur midfielder dejan kulusevski has gone under the knife in a patella surgery days before their europa league final clash with manchester united. The swedish international picked up the injury while playing for tottenham hotspur against crystal palace in the premier league last weekend.

Article Title: David Carr hints at his brother Derek Carr‚Äôs total withdrawal after his recent retirement
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Derek Carr)





David Carr says one of the reasons for Derek Carr‚Äôs retirement is that his children are getting older

New York Giants former QB David Carr says New Orleans Saints former QB Derek Carr walked away from a lot of money

Super Bowl XLVI champion David Carr says 4-time Pro Bowler Derek Carr has moved on

Also read:

The New Orleans Saints were counting on their star quarterback Derek Carr‚Äôs return, but a medical examination of his right shoulder led him to leave the NFL, in its entirety. Carr considered surgery, but the medical staff could not fully promise that his shoulder would feel the same after it. Taking into account many factors, 34-year-old Derek Carr opted for an early retirement on May 10.Ever since then, everybody‚Äôs in shock. Including his own older brother, David Carr. David Carr said, ‚ÄúHe walked away from a lot of money, I look at it from the player‚Äôs perspective.‚Äù David Carr played for the New York Giants as their starting quarterback and retired from that position when he, himself, was 32 or 33 years old.On May 14, David Carr talks about his brother - Derek Carr‚Äôs total withdrawal, no comeback, no second thoughts about his return, and contentment after retirement - with Ian Rapoport, NFL Insider, and Judy Battista, American Sports Journalist for NFL.com.David Carr shared with Ian Rapoport and Judy Battista, ‚ÄúThe decision was not easy. It was something that he(Derek Carr) had to think long and hard about.There were a lot of different things that factored into it - his children are getting older - they wanna play catch with their dad, they wanna be around, his shoulder wasn‚Äôt what it was before, and when he tried to ramp up throwing again this year, it just didn‚Äôt feel right, it never felt comfortable.And, he knows how hard it is to go through an NFL season fully healthy, as opposed to kind of trying to struggle your way into getting ready to play Week 1. All those factors weighed in.‚ÄùThe NFL completion percentage leader, David Carr, shared, ‚ÄúIt was time. He‚Äôs very content with where he is. He walked away from a lot of money - I look at it from the player‚Äôs perspective. He could have easily said - you know, I‚Äôll have the surgery, let me just get through the season, just cut me a cheque.‚ÄùFormer quarterback for the Houston Texans expressed, ‚ÄúI believe he‚Äôs done. Derek loves the game. I think more than anything, he loved his teammates. I could tell, just in the last couple of days, he‚Äôs definitely done playing, he‚Äôs moved on because like I said, his family, his boys, and his little girl are getting older and they‚Äôre probably gonna want their dad around more, so that means more to him than anything else.‚Äù
Article Summary: Derek carr, 34, retired from the nfl on may 10. The new orleans saints were counting on their star quarterback's return. Carr considered surgery, but the medical staff could not fully promise that his shoulder would feel the same after it.

Article Title: 'Players ke sath gandi baatein karni chahiye': Rohit Sharma's hilarious clip goes viral - Watch
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll How do you feel about Rohit Sharma's retirement from Test cricket? Happy, it was time for a change Sad, he was a great player

NEW DELHI: Rohit Sharma may have retired from Test cricket, but his off-field wit continues to bowl fans over. In a recent lighthearted interview with journalist Vimal Kumar, a clip of Rohit jokingly saying, ‚ÄúPlayers ke sath gandi baatein karni chahiye,‚Äù has taken social media by storm.The moment began with Rohit casually dropping the remark, which immediately raised eyebrows, only for him to clarify with a laugh, ‚Äúhona chahiye ki woh kyu nahi khel raha hai,‚Äù referring to tough and honest conversations about team selections.Vimal Kumar, visibly amused, responded, ‚ÄúOh, aap tough talk ki baat kar rahe hai,‚Äù prompting Rohit to quip, ‚ÄúTum sirf galat cheezein hi sochte ho!‚Äù Both burst into laughter, and the internet hasn‚Äôt stopped laughing since.Watch:Fans on X (formerly Twitter) flooded timelines with the clip, celebrating Rohit‚Äôs trademark candidness and cheeky humour. The moment offered a rare look at the lighter side of a cricketer often under intense public scrutiny.This viral moment comes on the heels of a major announcement: Rohit Sharma has officially retired from Test cricket. The 38-year-old posted an emotional message on Instagram, ending a 67-match red-ball career that saw him score over 4,300 runs with 12 centuries last Wednesday.Despite a dip in recent Test form, Rohit‚Äôs legacy as a late-blooming, dependable opener is secure.While he steps away from the whites, Rohit remains committed to ODIs and continues to influence Indian cricket with both bat and mind. From leading India to the 2024 T20 World Cup title to giving fans viral moments like these, Rohit Sharma‚Äôs presence in Indian cricket remains both impactful and entertaining.
Article Summary: Rohit sharma has retired from test cricket. The 38-year-old scored over 4,300 runs with 12 centuries in 67 matches. Rohit remains committed to odis and continues to influence indian cricket with both bat and mind. Poll how do you feel about rohit sharma's retirement?

Article Title: Jason Kelce‚Äôs post-NFL weight loss journey from 295 to 270 pounds
Article Text:
Jason Kelce sheds 25 pounds post NFL retirement (Image via: Getty Images)

The real story behind Jason Kelce‚Äôs 25-pound post-retirement weight drop



Jason Kelce‚Äôs transformation says about post-career identity



Shirtless Jason Kelce Shows Off Almost 30-Pound Weight Loss | E! News

Jason Kelce spent over a decade bulldozing defenders as a 295-pound juggernaut on the Philadelphia Eagles‚Äô offensive line. But now, in retirement, he's fighting a very different battle, one against the very body that made him a football legend. Since hanging up his cleats, Kelce has dropped 25 pounds and counting, and while fans are praising his leaner look, some are wondering: why do so many NFL players feel compelled to erase their on-field physiques as soon as they leave the league?Kelce‚Äôs weight loss journey has been anything but quiet. On his popular New Heights podcast, he joked about resembling an ‚Äúoverweight Oompa Loompa‚Äù during his playing days, citing his long-time love for burgers, donuts, and pizza. Now, just weeks after revealing he hit 283 pounds, the ex-Eagle told Us Weekly he‚Äôs shed even more, hovering around 270, thanks in part to a ‚Äúbody fat loss competition‚Äù with former teammate Beau Allen.Kelce isn't the only lineman shedding mass post-retirement. Across the league, a growing number of ex-NFL stars are rapidly transforming their bodies, often within months of stepping off the field. It‚Äôs a phenomenon raising questions: Is it about health, or is the league‚Äôs obsession with size forcing players to live in unsustainable bodies for the sake of performance and then abandon them for ‚Äúnormalcy‚Äù once their contracts end?Kelce himself acknowledged the odd aesthetic shift many linemen face. ‚ÄúThey lose too much weight and look like bobbleheads,‚Äù he told GQ. ‚ÄúTheir necks gets so small, but their heads stay the same size.‚Äù For now, Kelce says he‚Äôs targeting the 250‚Äì265 range, just enough to look ‚Äúbig and happy‚Äù without chasing six-pack abs or ditching every comfort food. But the message is murky. Fans cheer when athletes bulk up, and then again when they slim down.Also Read: Madden Biopic: Christian Bale and Nicolas Cage bring NFL legends Al Davis and John Madden to life Kelce‚Äôs transformation is inspiring, no doubt. It marks a new chapter in life after football, one where players shift away from the physical demands of the game. They‚Äôre not just retiring from the sport; they‚Äôre evolving beyond the bodies and routines that once defined them. It‚Äôs a powerful reminder that life after the field is just as defining.
Article Summary: Jason kelce has shed 25 pounds since retiring from the nfl. The former philadelphia eagles offensive lineman says he's aiming for 250-265 pounds. Kelce is one of a growing number of ex-nfl players who are shedding mass after retirement.

Article Title: How many ODI matches will Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli play before 2027 World Cup?
Article Text:
Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Will the absence of Kohli and Rohit in Test cricket affect India's performance in ODIs? No, not at all Yes, significantly

"I will continue to play the ODI format,"

India‚Äôs ODI schedule before 2027 World Cup

Virat Kohli & Anushka Visit Vrindavan After Test Retirement | Meet Premanand Ji Maharaj

Full schedule:

August 2025 ‚Äì Bangladesh (Away)

3 ODIs in turning conditions, marking India‚Äôs return to 50-over cricket after the Champions Trophy triumph.



October‚ÄìNovember 2025 ‚Äì Australia (Away)

3 high-profile ODIs between 2023 World Cup finalists.



November‚ÄìDecember 2025 ‚Äì South Africa (Home)

3 ODIs against a strong Proteas outfit in Indian conditions.



January 2026 ‚Äì New Zealand (Home)

3 ODIs against the side they defeated in the 2025 Champions Trophy final.



June 2026 ‚Äì Afghanistan (Home)

3 ODIs; Afghanistan bring a potent spin attack and an ever-improving squad.



July 2026 ‚Äì England (Away)

3 ODIs in challenging English conditions, a vital overseas assignment before the World Cup.



September‚ÄìOctober 2026 ‚Äì West Indies (Home)

3 ODIs; the Caribbean side brings flair and power to the subcontinent.



October‚ÄìNovember 2026 ‚Äì New Zealand (Home)

3 ODIs as the Kiwis return for their second tour of India in the cycle.



December 2026 ‚Äì Sri Lanka (Home)

3 ODIs; India look to avenge their 0‚Äì2 ODI series defeat from 2024 in Sri Lanka.

With both Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma retiring from Test cricket, India's roadmap to the 2027 ICC Cricket World Cup enters a new phase. The legendary duo, who have served Indian cricket across formats for over a decade, will now focus solely on One-Day Internationals in the build-up to the next 50-over World Cup, to be hosted by South Africa, Zimbabwe and Namibia in October‚ÄìNovember 2027.India are set to play 27 ODIs across nine bilateral series against eight different nations before the tournament, offering both veterans ample match time to prepare for what could be their final World Cup appearances.Virat Kohli recently announced his retirement from Test cricket through a social media post, ending a red-ball career that spanned 123 matches and 9,230 runs at an average of 46.85. He also stepped away from T20 Internationals earlier this year, but remains committed to ODIs ‚Äî the format in which he was the highest run-scorer in the 2023 World Cup held in India.Rohit Sharma, who had already stepped away from T20Is after captaining India to the 2024 T20 World Cup title, confirmed that he will carry on in the 50-over format. Speaking recently, he stated,making his intentions clear ahead of what could be his final World Cup campaign.Quiz: Who's that IPL player? With both stalwarts moving on from the longer formats, India will rely on their experience to guide a younger core of players through the next ODI cycle.India's lead-up to the World Cup will include six home series and three overseas tours, allowing them to face varied opposition in different conditions. This sequence of games will also help the selectors assess combinations and build squad depth.If fit, both Kohli and Rohit could play in most of the 27 scheduled matches, balancing form, workload, and leadership roles. Even appearing in 20‚Äì22 games would allow them to contribute meaningfully while guiding emerging talent through this important phase.The next two years will be about transition, but also about legacy ‚Äî with India's two greatest modern ODI batters preparing for one final shot at World Cup glory in southern Africa.
Article Summary: Virat kohli and rohit sharma have both retired from test cricket. The duo will now focus solely on one-day internationals. India will play 27 odis before the 2027 icc cricket world cup. The world cup will be held in south africa, zimbabwe and namibia.

Article Title: Blue Jays suffer a major blow as Max Scherzer‚Äôs return hits another snag
Article Text:
Image Source: Getty

Max Scherzer's thumb injury continues to hamper recovery

Blue Jays explore alternatives amid Max Scherzer's absence

The Toronto Blue Jays‚Äô 2025 season has been dealt a major blow as the veteran right-hander Max Scherzer‚Äôs return has been delayed. Max Scherzer, a three-time Cy Young Award winner, has been out since he made his season debut on March 29 but could not pitch effectively with inflammation in his right thumb. Although there was hope for a quick return, Scherzer‚Äôs rehabilitation took longer than anticipated, and now he fears he might not play again this season.Scherzer‚Äôs thumb problems have been a lingering issue since spring training and have been impacting both his grip and overall arm health. He has described the thumb as ‚Äúabsolutely critical to your arm health‚Äù and said it was essential to correct the problem instead of attempting to pitch through it. Scherzer attempted to begin throwing again after getting a second cortisone injection in April, but still felt pain, especially after throwing around 50 pitches. His only outing this season was a three-inning start against the Baltimore Orioles in which he allowed two solo shots before leaving because of right lat soreness, a complication stemming from the thumb issue.The Blue Jays need pitching help with Scherzer hitting the 60-day injury list. They have considered internal candidates like Yariel Rodriguez, but are also looking outside the organization. The Blue Jays are rumored to be interested in picking up Mitch Keller of the Pittsburgh Pirates‚Äìa great pitcher who has put up numbers, as a replacement for Scherzer. Keller is pitching like a stud, and with his value at $77 million, it makes him a very nice trade candidate for Toronto if they want to stay competitive in the AL East.Max Scherzer‚Äôs rehabilitation will be progressed cautiously, and the earliest he can return is May 29. The Blue Jays hope he can help them later in the year, but his availability and readiness will determine that. In the meantime, Toronto‚Äôs front office has to make adjustments, bolstering its pitching staff to make way through the season without one of its top off-season additions.While Scherzer cannot be out there, he remains a leader in the clubhouse. The staff appreciates his leadership role and his ability to mentor the team's young pitchers, even in the run-up to the 18th inning of a game. Despite what he brought to the field, Max Scherzer‚Äôs impact off the field could yet prove pivotal as the Blue Jays fight to remain in playoff position.Also Read: Max Scherzer seen mocking umpire C.B. Bucknor in the Blue Jays vs Guardians match | MLB News
Article Summary: Max scherzer's thumb injury continues to hamper recovery for the toronto blue jays. The three-time cy young award winner fears he might not play again this season. The blue jays are rumored to be interested in picking up mitch keller of the pittsburgh pirates as a replacement for scherzer.

Article Title: Wordle today #1425: Get hints and answer to today's puzzle May 14, 2025
Article Text:
Wordle May 14, 2025: Here‚Äôs today‚Äôs hints, clues, and answer

Wordle hints and answers today

Poll How often do you play Wordle? Rarely or never Occasionally A few times a week Every day

Wordle hints and clues for May 14

The word starts with the letter 'B'.

It contains one vowel.

The word ends with letter 'O'.

The word has one repeating letter.

Today's Wordle is either of a pair of small, long-bodied drums typically held between the knees and played with the fingers.

Wordle, May 14, 2025: Word of the day

Today's Wordle word is ‚ÄòBONGO‚Äô.

How did Wordle originate

Where can you play Wordle





How to play Wordle

Wordle FAQs

Can I play past Wordle puzzles?

No, Wordle is designed as a daily game with a unique puzzle each day. While you can‚Äôt play past puzzles on the official site, there are unofficial Wordle archives available where you can play previous games.

How do the color-coded tiles work in Wordle?

Green means the letter is correct and in the correct position.

Yellow means the letter is correct but in the wrong position.

Gray means the letter is not in the word at all.

How many guesses do I get in Wordle?

You have six chances to guess the correct five-letter word. After each guess, you receive feedback to help guide your next attempt.

Can I play Wordle more than once per day?

Wordle is designed as a daily puzzle, so you can only play one puzzle per day. The word of the day is the same for everyone globally, and once you complete it, you‚Äôll have to wait until the next day for a new puzzle.

Can letters repeat in Wordle?

Yes, repeated letters can appear in Wordle answers. Words containing duplicate letters can present more of a challenge when solving.

Is Wordle available in other languages?

Yes, there are multiple versions of Wordle available in various languages, including Spanish, French, and German. You can switch to a different language by finding the corresponding version of the game online.

Wordle is a popular word puzzle game that challenges players to guess a five-letter word within six attempts. Developed by Josh Wardle, this simple yet addictive game has taken the world by storm with its easy-to-understand rules and daily challenges. Each guess provides feedback with colored tiles: green indicates the correct letter in the correct spot, yellow signals the correct letter in the wrong spot, and gray means the letter isn't in the word. Wordle‚Äôs mix of logic and vocabulary makes it a daily brain teaser loved by millions worldwide. The game's minimalist design and once-a-day format have contributed to its viral success. It also fosters friendly competition, as players often share their results on social media without giving away the answer.The Wordle puzzle can be tricky to solve, which is likely why you‚Äôve found yourself here, struggling to crack today‚Äôs challenge. As always, today‚Äôs NYT Wordle was full of surprises, but don‚Äôt worry‚Äîwe‚Äôre here to help. Below, you‚Äôll find some helpful clues for today‚Äôs Wordle answer , and if those don‚Äôt do the trick, keep reading to discover the solution directly. Sometimes the word includes uncommon letters or double letters that throw players off.Today‚Äôs Wordle promises a puzzle that tests your linguistic skills, likely to be decoded by many participants. To assist you in solving the puzzle, we've curated a fresh array of hints and clues for today's Wordle challenge.Whether you have cracked the code or are still working with the hints, it is now time to reveal the answer. Drumroll please, as we unveil the answer for Wordle.Wordle was initially developed by engineer Josh Wardle as a thoughtful gift for his partner. However, it quickly gained massive popularity, turning into a global sensation with thousands of players engaging daily. The game's success inspired fans to create various spin-offs, such as the battle royale-style Squabble, the music identification game Heardle, and multi-word challenges like Dordle and Quordle. Its simplicity, paired with daily novelty, made it a part of many people's morning routine.The viral appeal also sparked academic interest in its psychological and linguistic impact.As its popularity soared, The New York Times acquired Wordle, and it became a hit on social media platforms like TikTok, where creators even livestream their gameplay sessions.Wordle isn't available as an app; it can only be played through a web browser. To play, simply visit the New York Times Games website.Originally hosted on its own site and created by Josh Wardle, Wordle was acquired by the New York Times in February of this year. One of the great aspects of Wordle is that it‚Äôs ad-free, allowing you to fully concentrate on the word-guessing game.To play Wordle, visit the link https://www.nytimes.com/games/wordle/index.html and begin guessing words.
Article Summary: Wordle was initially developed by engineer josh wardle as a thoughtful gift for his partner. It quickly gained massive popularity, turning into a global sensation with thousands of players engaging daily. The word of the day is the same for everyone globally, and once you complete it, you‚Äôll have to wait until the next day for a new puzzle.

How to play NYT Connections



Don't analyse the connections too deeply.

The game tends to employ simple links such as sounding similar, similar spellings, or common themes.

Example: "dear" and "deer" tend to be linked by sound, not by some elaborate relationship such as predator and prey.

You have only four guesses per puzzle per day, so every guess matters.

Don't mindlessly click‚Äîconsider each set carefully before submitting.

Try to come up with at least three connected words confidently before trying a set.

The initial organization is deliberately mischievous to mislead you.

Shuffling the words may allow you to see new patterns or concealed connections.

Shuffle it as a routine to begin and whenever you are stuck.

The NYT Connections puzzle for May 11, 2025, is back to challenge your wits and test your ability to spot subtle patterns in words. If you are new to the game or feeling stuck, don‚Äôt worry. The complete answer is also shared below.Whether you are a seasoned player or trying it out for the first time, today‚Äôs puzzle blends straightforward clues with clever wordplay that will keep you thinking.NYT Connections is a daily word game offered by The New York Times that tasks players with organising 16 words into four groups of four, where each group shares a common theme. The game was developed under the guidance of associate puzzle editor Wyna Liu and has quickly gained popularity for its blend of logic, vocabulary, and creativity. Players are allowed four incorrect guesses, and each set is colour-coded from easiest to hardest: yellow, green, blue, and purple. Until then, happy puzzling!If you're a beginner or simply wanting to enhance your strategy, these tips will see you triumph in the puzzle game where you sort 16 words into 4 related sets. Article Title: Virat Kohli retires not just as a central force but India's greatest Test captain
Article Text:
Indian test cricket team captain Virat Kohli celebrates as the last South African wicket of Morne Morkel, right, falls to give India a 3-0 win in the test series in New Delhi, India, Monday, Dec. 7, 2015. (AP Photo /Tsering Topgyal)

New Delhi:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Virat Kohli retires from Test cricket after 14 years

Poll What do you think is Virat Kohli's greatest achievement as a Test captain? Winning the Border-Gavaskar Trophy in Australia Leading India to the top Test ranking Highest run scorer among captains Most Test matches won

Runs alongside captaincy armband

Virat Kohli's retirement announcement created quite the stir on Monday, even if it did feel like coming to some. Over the past few days, as TimesofIndia.com had reported, the right-hander had hinted at stepping away in Australia. Yet, he harboured hopes of leading in England with Rohit Sharma stepping down a couple of days ago. When that bid was turned down, with the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) opting for Shubman Gill, the writing was on the wall."As I step away from this format, it‚Äôs not easy ‚Äî but it feels right. I‚Äôve given it everything I had, and it‚Äôs given me back so much more than I could‚Äôve hoped for," wrote 36-year-old Kohli on Instagram."I‚Äôll always look back at my Test career with a smile. #269, signing off," he added.With Kohli retiring, India lost not just a mainstay at No. 4 spot - a position that had Sachin Tendulkar first and Kohli next for over three decades - but one of the batting forces.Sure, his powers were on the decline in the last couple of years, but his overall tally of 9,230 runs puts him in fourth place among India's highest Test scorers. The list is helmed by Sachin Tendulkar (15,921 runs), Rahul Dravid (13,265 runs) and Sunil Gavaskar (10,122 runs).Above and beyond the pure run-scoring, Kohli's leadership skills is another aspect that will be sorely missed. He might not have led the team since 2022, but his presence, animated gestures and pumped up energy could not be ignored. Even in what turned out to be his last Test in Sydney, Kohli led the lines with Rohit Sharma not in the playing XI and Jasprit Bumrah off the field due to injury.Kohli‚Äôs relentless and assertive leadership, propelled India to become the top-ranked Test team. When India won the Border-Gavaskar Trophy in 2018-19, Kohli became the first Asian captain to record a series win Down under. That was followed by a 2-1 series lead in England, which eventually finished 2-2 after a COVID-19 break.Beyond the passion and intensity, the statistics also reveal a story that aligns with what‚Äôs visible ‚Äî Kohli was undeniably the best Indian captain and stood out among his peers.As captain (2014-2022), Kohli racked up numbers that make him India's most successful Test captain. He led India in 68 matches, winning 40, losing 17 and drawing 11. Under him, India had a winning rate of 58.8% . Among Indian captains who led in at least 10 matches, that is the best number. Behind Kohli are Rohit Sharma (50%), MS Dhoni (45%), Sourav Ganguly (43%) and Rahul Dravid (32%).In terms of absolute numbers, India triumphed in 40 matches with Kohli wearing the captaincy armband. It was followed by Dhoni (27), Ganguly (21), Mohammad Azharuddin (14) and Rohit Sharma (12).Even at a global stage, Kohli's leadership numbers match up to the greats of the game. Of captains with at least 50 Test matches, only seven have a win percentage above 50%. Besides Kohli, this list features Graeme Smith, Ricky Ponting, Steve Waugh, Hansie Cronje, Michael Vaughan, Sir Viv Richards, and Mark Taylor.If you zoom in to his records, Kohli also led India to most matches won at home. He played a crucial role in India's unbeaten streak at home that ran from 2012 until 2024.Kohli-led India triumphed in 24 Tests of 31 played on home soil, only fewer than Smith's South Africa (30 wins in 53) and Ponting (29 wins in 39).Among Indians, MS Dhoni had won 21 home Tests ahead of Azharuddin (13) and Ganguly, Rohit (10).Another challenging aspect of a Test captain is to keep the flow of runs going. Even if they wear the captain's armband, the runs or wickets column cannot dry up. That is a hallmark of great players who become even greater leaders. And Kohli ticked both boxes during his captaincy reign.Despite the extra pressure, Kohli was the highest run scorer among the Indian Test captains. He scored 5864 runs as India Test captain, including 20 centuries and 18 fifties at an average of 54.80. His highest Test score - 254 against South Africa - came when he was the skipper.It is worth highlighting that 63% of Kohli's career Test runs came when he was captain of the Indian cricket team.Behind him in the list stand Dhoni (3454 runs), Sunil Gavaskar (3449 runs), Azharuddin (2856 runs) and Ganguly (2561). When looked at it from a batting average perspective, Kohli, once again, leads the charts followed by Tendulkar (51.35), Gavaskar (50.72), Dravid (44.51) and Azharuddin (43.93).Once again, when pitted against captains from all over the world, Kohli was right up there. The 36-year-old scored 20 centuries as Test captain, which is the second-most after Graeme Smith (28).He also scored seven double centuries - most among all captains. His 5864 Test runs as captain is the fourth-highest for any player, behind Smith (8659 runs), Border (6623) and Ponting (6542).Among Indian captains, Kohli scored the most runs on home soil. His 2907 runs from 31 matches, at an average of 67.60, is more than Gavaskar (2426), Dhoni (1863), MAK Pataudi (1481) and Azharuddin (1339).As Kohli walks off into the sunset, India will be poorer at No. 4, with the runs on the scorecard, the charged up attitude and the leadership, even if he had let go of the armband three years ago.
Article Summary: Virat kohli retires from test cricket after 14 years as a player and captain. He led india in 68 matches, winning 40, losing 17 and drawing 11. Under him, india had a winning rate of 58.8%. Rohit kohli was the highest run scorer among indian test captains. He scored 5864 runs as india test captain, including 20 centuries and 18 fifties at an average of 54.80.
